system.summary: Plant the seeds of an herb for greater yields at a later date.

description.value:
As a Rest Action, you can plant seeds in a 5 ft area of prepared soil. So long as it isn’t dying, the plant grows over the course of months, but their output is greatly multiplied.
In their natural biome, plants survive so long as they are treated once a week. Outside of their natural biome, they generally survive so long as they are treated once a day, so long as they are shielded from the more extreme elements of the biome, such as heat or cold.

  • Common Flora: 
    • Yield: x20 per 5ft.
    • Harvest Period: 1 month.
  • Uncommon Flora: 
    • Yield: x10 per 5ft.
    • Harvest Period: 2 months.
  • Rare Flora: 
    • Yield x5 per 5ft.
    • Harvest Period: 3 months.
